long_description:
This simple mod introduces a unique movement techique called “ejection”. An
ejection is done by holding the “Aux1” control (`E` by default on desktop)
for a certain time and unpressing it afterwards while looking at the needed
direction. The bar appearing on top of the screen shows how strong the ejection 
is going to be and how long one should wait before a next ejection.

## Licensing and Acknowledgements

This work is fully available under [CC0 1.0
Universal](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode).

The sound effect of ejection (`ejection_whoosh.ogg`) is derived from this
sound: <https://freesound.org/people/pryanic/sounds/776651/>. The rest of the
mod is original.
name: ejection
short_description: A unique movement mechanic resembling strong jumping.
title: Ejection
